description: Red Sunset® Red Maple is an amazing tree for any landscape. Its foliage turns brilliant shades of red, orange and yellow in the fall and its lush green leaves add a captivating splash of colour to the landscape all season long. This fast-growing deciduous tree can reach heights of up to 50 feet with a spread of 35 feet, and it thrives in USDA Hardiness Zones 3−9. It also tolerates air pollution and wet, clay soils, and its drought and wind tolerance make it a perfect choice for many different conditions and locations. Red Sunset® Red Maple is an excellent option for urban yards, parks and gardens.
